Package com.intellij.openapi.progress

Interface PerformInBackgroundOption

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BackgroundFromStartOption, BackgroundUpdaterTask, BackgroundUpdaterTaskBase, BaseContentCloseListener.WaitForProcessTask, BaseDiffFromHistoryHandler.CollectChangesTask, CleanupWorker, CompilerTask, ListBackgroundUpdaterTask, PerformAnalysisInBackgroundOption, PluginManagerUISettings, RunnableBackgroundableWrapper, SearchForTestsTask, SearchInBackgroundOption, SvnFormatWorker, SvnIntegrateChangesTask, Task.Backgroundable, Task.ConditionalModal, TaskUiUtil.ComboBoxUpdater, TaskUiUtil.RemoteFetchTask, VcsBackgroundTask

    public interface PerformInBackgroundOption

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static PerformInBackgroundOption ALWAYS_BACKGROUND 
      static PerformInBackgroundOption DEAF
      In this mode the corresponding ProgressIndicator will be shown in progress dialog with "Background" button.

    • Field Detail

      • DEAF

        static final PerformInBackgroundOption DEAF
        In this mode the corresponding ProgressIndicator will be shown in progress dialog with "Background" button. Users may send the task to background.
